long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best way to learn English language. Improve your vocabulary and listening comprehension skills.

Quick save unknown words while browsing the web or watching your favorite movies with daul subtitles on Netflix. Playback the saved words in random order, learn to quickly memorize the learned translation of new words.
